languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас издает утробный, исполненный ярости крик. Поршни с шипением утопают в его плоти, вгоняя в нее дозу алхимической злобы. Запах приближающегося кровопролития сводит с ума монстра, изготовленного для бойни.{/n}

{n}Achilleas lets out a raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rage. The smell of imminent bloodshed sends the monster created for carnage into a frenzy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас издает утробный, исполненный ярости крик. Поршни с шипением утопают в его плоти, вгоняя в нее дозу алхимической злобы. Запах приближающегося кровопролития сводит с ума монстра, изготовленного для бойни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The howl is echoed by Achilleas's raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rampage. The smell of imminent bloodshed frenzies the monster, the sole purpose of whose creation was to sow carnage.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Achilleas laisse échapper un cri guttural. Dans un sifflement, des pistons se plantent dans sa peau et lui injectent une dose de fureur pure. La perspective du massacre à venir aiguillonne encore plus le monstre créé pour semer le carnage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rage. The smell of imminent bloodshed sends the monster created for carnage into a frenzy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas laisse échapper un cri guttural. Dans un sifflement, des pistons se plantent dans sa peau et lui injectent une dose de fureur pure. La perspective du massacre à venir aiguillonne encore plus le monstre créé pour semer le carnage.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯发出了一声狂暴的怒吼。他身上连着的活塞发出了嘶嘶声，沉入了他的肉体，为他注入了一剂诱发狂怒的炼金药剂。这只怪物闻到了即将到来的血腥味道，彻底陷入了疯狂之中，渴望肆意屠杀猎物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rage. The smell of imminent bloodshed sends the monster created for carnage into a frenzy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯发出了一声狂暴的怒吼。他身上连着的活塞发出了嘶嘶声，沉入了他的肉体，为他注入了一剂诱发狂怒的炼金药剂。这只怪物闻到了即将到来的血腥味道，彻底陷入了疯狂之中，渴望肆意屠杀猎物。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}アキレアスが怒号を発する。ピストンがヒューと音を立てて彼の肉体に食い込み、暴走した錬金術の産物のような薬が注入される。迫り来る鮮血の匂いに、殺戮のために生み出された怪物は狂喜する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rage. The smell of imminent bloodshed sends the monster created for carnage into a frenzy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスが怒号を発する。ピストンがヒューと音を立てて彼の肉体に食い込み、暴走した錬金術の産物のような薬が注入される。迫り来る鮮血の匂いに、殺戮のために生み出された怪物は狂喜する。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Achilleas stößt einen kehligen Schrei aus. Zischend bohren sich Kolben in sein Fleisch und injizieren ihm eine Dosis alchemistischen Zorn. Der Geruch von nahendem Blutvergießen versetzt das für Massaker geschaffene Monster in einen Rausch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rage. The smell of imminent bloodshed sends the monster created for carnage into a frenzy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Geheul findet ein Echo in Achilleas' wutentbranntem, kehligem Schrei. Zischend bohren sich Kolben in sein Fleisch und lassen ihn in alchemistische Berserkerwut verfallen. Der Geruch des baldigen Blutvergießens versetzt das Monster in einen Rausch, dessen einziger Zweck darin liegt, Blutbäder anzurichten.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Achilleas suelta un rugido gutural. Unos pistones se hunden en su carne con un siseo, inyectándole una dosis de furia alquímica. El olor del inminente derramamiento de sangre enloquece al monstruo, creado solo para la masacre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rage. The smell of imminent bloodshed sends the monster created for carnage into a frenzy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas suelta un rugido gutural. Unos pistones se hunden en su carne con un siseo, inyectándole una dosis de furia alquímica. El olor del inminente derramamiento de sangre enloquece al monstruo, creado solo para la masacre.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, hiddetle boğuk boğuk haykırıyor. Pistonların tıslayıp vücuduna gömülerek enjekte ettiği bir dozla, simyasal bir öfkeye sürükleniyor. Yakında dökülecek kanın kokusu, katliam için yaratılmış bu canavarı kendinden geçiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a raging guttural cry. Pistons sink into his flesh with a hiss, injecting it with a dose of alchemical rage. The smell of imminent bloodshed sends the monster created for carnage into a frenzy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas, hiddetle boğuk boğuk haykırıyor. Pistonların tıslayıp vücuduna gömülerek enjekte ettiği bir dozla, simyasal bir öfkeye sürükleniyor. Yakında dökülecek kanın kokusu, katliam için yaratılmış bu canavarı kendinden geçiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack
